author: Jeffery Martin
title: Majority of Americans Believe Trump Should Enact Nationwide Stay-at-Home Order, Poll Says
description: 61 percent of individuals surveyed said Trump should issue a stay-at-home order for the entire country.
content:
Most Americans believe President Donald Trump needs to issue a national stay-at-home order in order to curb the spread of the coronavirus, according to polling data released Wednesday by The Economist and data analytics firm YouGov.
